Title: Valle de las Navas - Arizona burgalesa
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

VALLE DE LAS NAVAS- ARIZONA BURGALESA

En el burebano Valle de las Navas, conocido como la Arizona burgalesa, se localiza un territorio en el que predomina un carácter estepario de fantasiosa apariencia y variadas tonalidades. Modelado por la erosión en los blandos materiales terciarios y cuaternarios, en la zona se suceden los conglomerados calcáreos, las arcillas rojas, las areniscas amarillentas, las margas blancas y grises, las calizas y las arenas del Mioceno Inferior. Este desierto burgalés, que no lo es tanto ya que es el hábitat ideal para muchas especies de aves esteparias y rapaces como el águila real, tiene su acceso principal desde Tobes y Rahedo.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera BU-V-5003, km 2
  • Coordenadas: 42º 30´ 12´´ N - 3º 33´ 01´´ W
  • Tipología: naturaleza
  • Agua: no.
  • Luz: no.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno
  • Propiedad: pública.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/arizona4.jpg" alt="navas-burgos-1" title_text="arizona4" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9012" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9010" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: Valley  of las Navas - Arizona burgalesa
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

VALLEY OF LAS NAVAS- ARIZONA BURGALESA

In the Valle de las Navas, known as the Arizona burgalesa, is located a territory in which a steppe-like character of fanciful appearance and varied tonalities predominates. Modelled by erosion in the soft Tertiary and Quaternary materials, the area is made up of calcareous conglomerates, red clays, yellowish sandstones, white and grey loams, limestone and sand from the Lower Miocene. This Burgos desert, which is not so deserted as it is the ideal habitat for many species of steppe birds and birds of prey such as the golden eagle, has its main access from Tobes and Rahedo.

 

  • Addres: BU-V-5003 Road, km 2
  • Coordinates: 42º 30´ 12´´ N – 3º 33´ 01´´ W
  • Typology: nature.
  • Water: no.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: public.

Title: Casa Avilés Osborne
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

CASA AVILÉS OSBORNE

Es una casa totalmente rehabilitada en 2019 que ha respetado la esencia.
Antiguamente fue propiedad del Monasterio benedictino de Santo Domingo de Silos, y se encuentra justo al lado de él, a unos 20 pasos de la entrada a la iglesia del monasterio.
Tiene planta baja más 2 plantas más buhardillas,
Techos de madera originales, decoración ecléctica con antigüedades. En planta baja está la cocina independiente, comedor independiente, y salón con tv y zona de trabajo con escritorio.
En planta 1, un gran salón con 2 balcones, que dan al Monasterio, con zona de trabajo y chimenea, y un baño completo, más lavandería con lavadora y secadora.
En planta 2, 3 dormitorios dobles exteriores y 2 baños (uno en suite)
En planta 3, 2 buhardillas con 2 habitaciones dobles, ambas con mesa de trabajo, y un aseo.

 

  • Dirección: calle Santo Domingo, 2. Santo Domingo de Silos.
  • Tipología: vivienda
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: privada.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="7470" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="7475" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="7477" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="7479" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: Avilés Osborne house
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

AVILÉS OSBORNE HOUSE

It is a house that has been completely refurbished in 2019, respecting its essence.
It was formerly owned by the Benedictine Monastery of Santo Domingo de Silos, and is located right next to it, about 20 steps from the entrance to the monastery church.
It has a ground floor plus 2 floors plus attics,
Original wooden ceilings, eclectic decoration with antiques. On the ground floor is the separate kitchen, separate dining room, and lounge with tv and work area with desk.
On floor 1, a large living room with 2 balconies overlooking the Monastery, with work area and fireplace, and a full bathroom, plus laundry with washing machine and dryer.
On floor 2, 3 exterior double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (one suite bathroom).
On floor 3, 2 attics with 2 double bedrooms, both with work table, and a toilet.

 

  • Address: calle Santo Domingo, 2. Santo Domingo de Silos.

Title: Castilfalé Palace
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

CASTILFALÉ PALACE

The current Municipal Archives of Burgos, corresponds to a building of the sixteenth century that has several rooms of great beauty and luxurious decoration. It has an area of subway galleries and its location is privileged, in front of the Cathedral.

 

  • Address: C/ Fernán González 60, Burgos
  • Coordinates: 42º 20´ 28´´ N, 3º 42´ 18´´ W
  • Typology: historicial - institutional boulding.
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: municipality.

CAMPOS DE LAVANDA

Recientemente, se cultiva lavanda en algunas zonas de Burgos, destacando municipios como Caleruega. Obviamente, es una localización temporal, siendo el comienzo del verano el momento de mayor esplendor.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera BU-910, km 25
  • Coordenadas: 41º 49´ 56´´ N, 3º 28´ 46´´ W
  • Tipología: campo de cultivo
  • Agua: no.
  • Luz: no
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: privada

LAVENDER FIELD

Recently, lavender is grown in some areas of Burgos, highlighting municipalities such as Caleruega. Obviously, it is a temporary location, being the beginning of summer the moment of greatest splendor.

 

  • Address: Road BU-910, km 25
  • Coordinates: 41º 49´ 56´´ N, 3º 28´ 46´´ W
  • Typology: crop field
  • Water: no.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: private.

Title: Old railway station
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

OLD RAILWAY STATION

When the high-speed railway arrived in Burgos, it was decided to divert the railroad to the north, so that several facilities were integrated as everyday elements for the citizens. This is the example of the old station, today converted into the "Science Station". It has several rooms for different uses and with multiple possibilities.

 

  • Address: Dr. José Luis Santamaría street, Burgos
  • Cordinates: 42º 20´ 04´´ N, 3º 42´28´´ W
  • Typology: institutional boulding.
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: municipality

Title: Antigua estación de tren
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

ANTIGUA ESTACIÓN DE TREN

Al llegar la alta velocidad a Burgos, se optó por desviar por el norte el paso del ferrocarril, con lo que varias instalaciones se integraron como elementos cotidianos para la ciudadanía. Es el ejemplo de la antigua estación, convertida hoy en la "Estación de la Ciencia". Cuenta con varias dependencias para usos diversos y con múltiples posibilidades.

 

  • Dirección: C/ Dr. José Luis Santamaría
  • Coordenadas: 42º 20´ 04´´ N, 3º 42´28´´ W
  • Tipología: edificio institucional
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: municipal

Title: Tobera waterfalls
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

TOBERA WATERFALLS

The Molinar River, as it passes through the small but charming municipality of Tobera, outlines several nooks and crannies in the form of waterfalls, banks and bucolic walks. The areas with the greatest visual potential can be easily reached within a few meters.

 

  • Address: Road BU-504, km 6
  • Coordinates: 42º 44´ 59´´ N, 3º 18´ 22´´ W
  • Typology: waterfall and rivers.
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good
  • Ownership: municipal. Although the riverbanks are freely accessible, to reach the waterfalls you have to go through the streets of the town.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/tobera3.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="tobera3" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8052" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8054" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8048" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8046" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: Cascadas de Tobera
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

CASCADAS DE TOBERA

El río Molinar, a su paso por el pequeño pero encantador municipio de Tobera, perfila varios rincones en forma de cascadas, riberas y paseos bucólicos. Se accede con facilidad hasta pocos metros de las zonas con mayor potencial visual.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera BU-504, km 6
  • Coordenadas:42º 44´ 59´´ N, 3º 18´ 22´´ W
  • Tipología: ríos y cascadas
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno
  • Propiedad: municipal. Si bien las riberas de los ríos son espacios de libre acceso, para llegar a las cascadas hay que acceder por las calles del pueblo
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/tobera3.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="tobera3" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8051" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8053" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8047" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8045" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: Diputación de Burgos Palace
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

DIPUTACIÓN DE BURGOS PALACE

Classic style building (XIX century) with more than 1200 square meters of floor area. It has several rooms with richly decorated ornaments, being especially showy the staircase leading to the second floor.

 

  • Address: Paseo del Espolón 38
  • Cordinates: 42º 20´ 28´´ N, 3º 42´ 00´´ W
  • Typology: institutional boulding.
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: Burgos Diputacion

PALACIO DE LA DIPUTACIÓN DE BURGOS

Edificio de corte clásico (Siglo XIX) con algo más de 1200 metros cuadrados en planta de superficie. Cuenta con varias estancias con decoración rica en adornos, siendo especialmente vistosa la escalera de acceso a la primera planta.

 

  • Dirección: Paseo del Espolón nº 34, Burgos
  • Coordenadas: 42º 20´ 28´´ N, 3º 42´ 00´´ W
  • Tipología: edificio institucional
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: Diputación de Burgos

Title: Avellaneda Palace
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

AVELLANEDA PALACE

Renaissance palace whose main attraction is the courtyard with a series of arches of great beauty. It has been the location of several filming, passing through its rooms personalities of the stature of Concha Velasco (Santa Teresa de Jesús, TVE series) or Fernando Fernán Gómez and Mario Cantinflas (Don Quixote rides again).

 

  • Address: Plaza Mayor, Peñaranda de Duero
  • Coordinates: 41º 41´ 17´´ N, 3º 28´ 50´´ W
  • Typology: historic boulding.
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good
  • Ownership: private

[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

PALACIO DE AVELLANEDA

Palacio renacentista cuyo principal atractivo es el patio con una serie de arcos de gran belleza. Ha sido localización de varios rodajes, pasando por sus estancias personalidades de la talla de Concha Velasco (Santa Teresa de Jesús, serie de TVE) o Fernando Fernán Gómez y Mario Cantinflas (Don Quijote cabalga de nuevo)

 

  • Dirección: Plaza Mayor de Peñaranda de Duero
  • Coordenadas: 41º 41´ 17´´ N, 3º 28´ 50´´ W
  • Tipología: edificio histórico
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno
  • Propiedad: privado

Title: Puente medieval de Pesquera de Ebro
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

PUENTE MEDIEVAL DE PESQUERA DE EBRO

Puente de tres ojos sobre el río Ebro. Construido en el Siglo XVII, cuenta con unos 50 metros de longitud y una altura de 13 metros. 

El pueblo cuenta además con varios blasones de gran vistosidad, siendo el más conocido el de "la casa del placer"

 

  • Dirección: Carretera BU-V-5143, km 8
  • Coordenadas:42º 48´ 07´´ N, 3º 43´ 20´´ W
  • Tipología: edificio histórico.
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: Pesquera de Ebro es conjunto histórico, precisa por tanto de permisos especiales.

Title: Medieval bridge of Pesquera de Ebro
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

MEDIEVAL BRIDGE OF PESQUERA DE EBRO

Bridge with three spans over the Ebro River. Built in the 17th century, it is about 50 meters long and 13 meters high.

The village also has several coats of arms of great showiness, the best known being that of "the house of pleasure".

  • Address: Road BU-V-5143, km 8
  • Coordinates: 42º 48´ 07´´ N, 3º 43´ 20´´ W
  • Typology: historical boulding.
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: Pesquera de Ebro is a historical site and therefore requires special permits.

PUENTE DE CIDAD DE EBRO

Puente de hormigón sobre el Ebro en Cidad de Ebro. Aunque es de construcción reciente, su curiosa morfología y la frondosa chopera que lo rodea, conforma un conjunto bucólico y de gran belleza.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera BU-V-5743, km 13
  • Coordenadas: 42º 53´ 29´´ N, 3º 42´ 55´´ W
  • Tipología: puente
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión pública

BRIDGE OF CIDAD DE EBRO

Concrete bridge over the Ebro in Cidad de Ebro. Although it is of recent construction, its curious morphology and the leafy poplar grove that surrounds it, conforms a bucolic set and of great beauty.

  • Address: Road BU-V-5743, km 13
  • Coordinates: 42º 53´ 29´´ N, 3º 42´ 55´´ W
  • Typology: bridge
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: public management

Title: Hotel Casa Barría
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

HOTEL CASA BaRRÍA

Situado en Pradoluengo, el Hotel Barría es una impresionante construcción con planta baja, una altura y una segunda planta abuhardillada, con unos 220 metros cuadrados por planta. La piedra y la madera predominan todas las estancias, dotándolas de gran calidez.

 

  • Dirección: C/ Gonazlo Arenas 1, Pradoluengo
  • Coordenadas: 42º 19´ 30´´ N, 3º 12´ 04´´ W
  • Tipología: hotel rural
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.

Title: Casa Barría Hotel
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

CASA BARRÍA HOTEL

Located in Pradoluengo, the Hotel Barría is an impressive construction with a first floor, a first floor and a second floor with attic, with about 220 square meters per floor. Stone and wood predominate in all the rooms, giving them great warmth.

  • Address: Gonzalo Arenas 1 street, Pradoluengo
  • Coordinates: 42º 19´ 30´´ N, 3º 12´ 04´´ W
  • Typology: country hotel
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: private management

Title: Glacial lakes of Neila
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

GLACIAL LAKES OF NEILA

Set of 5 lagoons of glacial origin in the Sierra de Neila. Although they have suffered some human intervention to stabilize their delicate hydrological balance, their appearance is impressive.

Access by vehicle to the shore of all of them, although in winter there may be problems due to the presence of snow as they are at high altitude (1,800 - 1,900 meters).

  • Coordinates: 42º 02´ 45´´ N, 3º 02´ 29´´ W
  • Typology: lagoon
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: Public management
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/LagunaNeila1.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="LagunaNeila1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8383" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8379" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8385" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8381" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: Lagunas glaciares de Neila
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

LAGUNAS GLACIARES DE NEILA

Conjunto de 5 lagunas de origen glaciar en la Sierra de Neila. Si bien han sufrido alguna intervención humana para estabilizar su delicado equilibrio hidrológico, su aspecto es impresionante.

Se accede mediante vehículo hasta la orilla de todas ellas, aunque en invierno puede haber problemas por la presencia de nieve ya que se encuentran a gran altitud (1.800 - 1.900 metros)

 

  • Coordenadas: 42º 02´ 45´´ N, 3º 02´ 29´´ W
  • Tipología: lagunas
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: no..
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: Gestión pública
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/LagunaNeila1.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="LagunaNeila1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8384" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8380" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8386" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8382" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

Title: Museo textil de Pradoluengo
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

MUSEO TEXTIL DE PRADOLUENGO

Museo que muestra todo el proceso de conversión de lana virgen en prendas como calcetines o boinas. Toda una cadena de procesado con maquinaria de gran tamaño y engranajes en perfecto estado de conservación y con capacidad para operar.

Se ubica en un edificio amplio, con todo el aspecto de industria del siglo pasado, tejado triangular incluido.

 

  • Dirección: C/ Rodríguez Valcárcel 14A, Pradoluengo
  • Coordenadas: 42º 19´ 19´´ N, 3º 11´ 41´´ W
  • Tipología: industria
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión privada - municipal
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/MuseoPradoluengo3.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="MuseoPradoluengo3" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8401" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8399" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8407" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8405" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: Pradoluengo Textile Museum
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

PRADOLUENGO TEXTIL MUSEUM

Museum that shows the whole process of converting virgin wool into garments such as socks or berets. A whole processing chain with large machinery and gears in perfect state of preservation and with capacity to operate.

It is located in a large building, with all the appearance of industry of the last century, including triangular roof.

  • Address: Rodríguez Valcárcel 14A street, Pradoluengo
  • Coordinates: 42º 19´ 19´´ N, 3º 11´ 41´´ W
  • Typology: industry
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: private - municipality management

Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="row" _builder_version="3.25" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

OLD FULLING MILL IN PRADOLUENGO

Old textile facility full of machinery and elements for the manufacture of socks and other garments. It is a showcase of vestiges of a flourishing industry of the twentieth century.

 

  • Adress: Adolfo Espinosa 75 street, Pradoluengo
  • Coordinates: 42º 19´ 21´´ N, 3º 11´ 53´´ W
  • Type: industry
  • Water: yes
  • Electrecity: yes
  • Coverage: yes
  • Condition: medium level, areas that would require a prior review
  • Ownership: private

Title: Antiguo batán en Pradoluengo
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

ANTIGUO BATÁN EN PRADOLUENGO

Antigua instalación textil repleta de maquinaria y elementos para la fabricación de calcetines y otras prendas. Supone todo un muestrario de vestigios de una industria floreciente del Siglo XX

 

  • Dirección: C/ Adolfo Espinosa 75, Pradoluengo
  • Coordenadas: 42º 19´ 21´´ N, 3º 11´ 53´´ W
  • Tipología: industria
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: medio, hay zonas que necesitarían una revisión previa
  • Propiedad: gestión privada

Title: Monasterio de Santa María de Rioseco
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

MONASTERIO DE SANTA MARÍA DE RIOSECO

Monasterio a orillas del río Ebro, con origen en el Siglo XIII y de estilo cisterciense. Tras años de abandono, recientemente ha visto un impulso restaurador que ha conseguido poner en valor uno de los edificios de más valor del norte de Burgos.

Cuenta con un perímetro de más de 6.000 metros cuadrados, habiendo zonas claramente en ruinas, pero otras con gran potencial, especialmente la zona del claustro.

 

  • Dirección: Ctra. BU-V-5741, km 3, Valle de Manzanedo
  • Coordenadas: 42º 53´ 38´´ N, 3º 37´ 56´´ W
  • Tipología: religioso
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: no.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: medio. Hay zonas impracticables, otras en buen estado.
  • Propiedad: gestión pública
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Rioseco1.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="Rioseco1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8439" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8441" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8444" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8433" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: Monastery of Santa María de Rioseco
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

PRADOLUENGO TEXTIL MUSEUM

Monastery on the banks of the Ebro River, with origins in the thirteenth century and Cistercian style. After years of abandonment, it has recently seen a restoring impulse that has managed to put in value one of the most valuable buildings in the north of Burgos.

It has a perimeter of more than 6,000 square meters, with areas clearly in ruins, but others with great potential, especially the cloister area.

  • Address: Road BU-V-5741, km 3, Valle de Manzanedo
  • Coordinates: 42º 53´ 38´´ N, 3º 37´ 56´´ W
  • Typology: religious
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: medium. Some areas are impracticable, others in good condition.
  • Ownership: public management
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Rioseco1.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="Rioseco1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8436" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8442" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8445" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8434" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

ISABEL I UNIVERSITY

Fully modernized university facilities occupying the renovated part of the old Seminary of Burgos (corresponding to another location file).
It has laboratories, sports facilities, offices and medical facilities.

  • Address: Fernán Gonzale 72 street, Burgos
  • Coordinates: 42º 20´ 30´´ N, 3º 42´ 36´´ W
  • Typology: institutional building
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: private management

Title: Universidad Isabel I, zona sin rehabilitar (Antiguo Seminario de Burgos)
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

UNIVERSIDAD ISABEL I, zona sin rehabilitar (Antiguo Seminario de Burgos)

Uno de los edificios más imponentes de Burgos, construido a mitades de Siglo XX. Una vez perdido su uso original, la parte Este se convirtió en un Hotel (Abba), mientras que la parte central y algunas zonas de la Oeste, son las actuales instalaciones de la Universidad Isabel I (cuenta con una ficha de la localización propia).
Sin embargo, sigue habiendo una buena parte en estado de abandono. Llama especialmente la atención la longitud del corredor principal, de unos 60 metros, con las posibilidades que implica para el tiro de cámara..

 

  • Dirección: C/ Fernán González, 72, Burgos
  • Coordenadas: 42º 20´ 30´´ N, 3º 42´ 36´´ W
  • Tipología: edificio institucional
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: medio.
  • Propiedad: gestión privada
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/seminario1.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="seminario1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8566" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8568" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8576" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8590" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: UNIVERSIDAD ISABEL I, unrenovated area (Old Seminary of Burgos)
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

ISABEL I UNIVERSITY, unrenovated area (Old Seminary of Burgos)

One of the most imposing buildings in Burgos, built in the mid-twentieth century. Once it lost its original use, the eastern part was converted into a Hotel (Abba), while the central part and some areas of the west, are the current facilities of the University Isabel I (it has its own location file).

However, there is still a large part in a state of abandonment. Particularly noteworthy is the length of the main corridor, about 60 meters, with the possibilities it implies for camera shooting.

  • Address: Fernán Gonzale 72 street, Burgos
  • Coordinates: 42º 20´ 30´´ N, 3º 42´ 36´´ W
  • Typology: institutional building
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: medium.
  • Ownership: private management

Title: Orbaneja del Castillo

La mezcla de roca travertina, agua, callejuelas y su posición en la ladera del valle del Ebro, provocan una serie de estampas de ensueño.

  • Coordenadas: 42º 50´ 03´´ N, 3º 47´ 37´´ W
  • Tipología: medio rural
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: Gestión pública

Title: Orbaneja del Castillo

ORBANEJA DEL CASTILLO

One of the most beautiful municipalities not only of Burgos, but of Spain, ranking in which it appears regularly in various surveys.

The mixture of travertine rock, water, narrow streets and its position on the slope of the Ebro valley, cause a series of dreamlike images.

 

  • Adress: BU-643 Road, km 7
  • Coordinates: 42º 50´ 03´´ N, 3º 47´ 37´´ W
  • Typology: rural enviroment
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: Municapility management

ERMITA DE SAN PANTALEÓN DE LOSA

Ermita románica del Siglo XIII, con unos 300 metros cuadrados de planta. Destaca poderosamente la atención su posición sobre un peñasco impresionante desde el que se domina una vista privilegiada.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera BU-V-550, km 15
  • Coordenadas: 42º 56´ 04´´ N, 3º 17´ 28´´ W
  • Tipología: edificio histórico.
  • Agua: no.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: Gestión pública.

HERMITAGE OF SAN PANTALEÓN DE LOSA

Romanesque hermitage of the XIII century, with about 300 square meters of plant. Its position on an impressive rocky outcrop from which it dominates a privileged view.

 

  • Address: Road BU-V-550, km 15
  • Coordinates: 42º 56´ 04´´ N, 3º 17´ 28´´ W
  • Typology: historical boulding.
  • Water: no.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: public management

Title: Paseo del Espolón
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

PASEO DEL ESPOLÓN

En la margen derecha del Río Arlanzón, discurre el Paseo del Espolón, una de las zonas más emblemáticas de Burgos. 

Cuenta con varias especies, especialmente los plataneros, muy cambiantes según la estación del año. Muchos de los establecimientos de los bajos comerciales mantienen un aspecto señorial.

El impresionante Arco de Santa María es otro de los símbolos de la ciudad..

 

  • Dirección: Paseo del Espolón s/n, Burgos
  • Coordenadas: 42º 20´ 25´´ N, 3º 42´ 05´´ W
  • Tipología: parques
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión municipal

Title: Espolón Promenade
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

ESPOLÓN PROMENADE

On the right bank of the Arlanzón River runs the Paseo del Espolón, one of the most emblematic areas of Burgos.

It has several species, especially the banana trees, very changeable according to the season of the year. Many of the establishments of the commercial first floor maintain a stately appearance.

The impressive Arch of Santa Maria is another of the symbols of the city.

 

  • Address: Paseo del Espolón s/n, Burgos
  • Coordinates: 42º 20´ 25´´ N, 3º 42´ 05´´ W
  • Typology: park
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: municipality management

Title: El Pozo Azul
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

POZO AZUL

Situado al noreste de la población de Covanera, es una de las surgencias de agua subterránea más valorada para realizar inmersiones de espeleobuceo:

https://grupoedelweiss.com/web/index.php/espeleobuceo-en-burgos-mainmenu-54/68-pozo-azul-covanera

Obviamente, una grabación subacuática está muy limitada por cuestiones técnicas, pero en superficie muestra una geomorfología muy interesante a la que hay que añadir la formación geológica en la zona de aparcamiento de una "chimenea de bruja" en perfectas condiciones.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera Nacional N-629, km 49 Covanera
  • Coordenadas: 42º 44´ 09´´ N, 3º 47´ 45´´ W
  • Tipología: laguna
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: no.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión pública

Title: Pozo Azul - Blue Well
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

POZO AZUL - BLUE WELL

Located northeast of the town of Covanera, it is one of the most valued groundwater springs for cave diving:

Pozo Azul. Covanera (grupoedelweiss.com)

Obviously, an underwater recording is very limited for technical reasons, but on the surface it shows a very interesting geomorphology to which must be added the geological formation in the parking area of a "witch's chimney" in perfect condition.

 

  • Address: N-629 Road, km 49 Covanera
  • Coordinates: 42º 44´ 09´´ N, 3º 47´ 45´´ W
  • Typology: lagoon
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: public management

Title: Palacio de la Cultura de Salas de los Infantes
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

PALACIO DE LA CULTURA DE SALAS DE LOS INFANTES

Edificio con pasado señorial, integrado en la villa de Salas de los Infantes y con un uso civil (biblioteca y salón de conferencias). Cuenta con tres alturas y una superficie en planta de unos 280 metros cuadrados.
La elegancia de las fachadas, así como un extenso jardín (más de 3000 metros cuadrados) y varias estancias interiores con revestimientos de mármol son sus características más destacadas. 

 

  • Dirección: Avenida de los Infantes de Lara 13, Salas de los Infantes
  • Coordenadas: 42º 01´ 19´´ N, 3º 17´ 09´´ W
  • Tipología: edificio institucional.
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: bueno.
  • Propiedad: Gestión municipal

Title: Palace of culture of Salas de los Infantes
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

PALACE OF CULTURE OF SALAS DE LOS INFANTES

Building with a stately past, integrated in the town of Salas de los Infantes and with a civil use (library and conference room). It has three floors and a floor area of about 280 square meters.

The elegance of the facades, as well as an extensive garden (more than 3,000 square meters) and several interior rooms with marble cladding are its most outstanding features.

  • Address: Infantes de Lara Avenue, Salas de los Infantes
  • Coordinates: 42º 01´ 19´´ N, 3º 17´ 09´´ W
  • Typology: institutional building
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: good.
  • Ownership: municipallity management.

CENTRO DE ARTE MODERNO DE CAJA BURGOS - CAB

Situado en el casco histórico de la ciudad de Burgos, a mitad de camino entre la Catedral y el Castillo, esta moderna construcción está perfectamente integrada en su entorno.
Su interior acoge un gran número de exposiciones, pero la geometría, los espacios diáfanos se mantienen en todo momento.

 

  • Dirección: C/ Saldaña 8, Burgos
  • Coordenadas: 42º 20´ 32´´ N, 3º 42´ 17´´ W
  • Tipología: museo
  • Agua: sí.

CAJA BURGOS MODERN ART CENTER - CAB

Its interior houses a large number of exhibitions, but the geometry, the diaphanous spaces are maintained at all times.

Title: Palacio de Saldañuela
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

PALACIO DE SALDAÑUELA

Palacio renacentista del Siglo XVI. Si bien ha sufrido diversas reformas, la zona de los exteriores y el claustro mantienen elementos originales. 
La zona interior presenta otro tipo de posibilidades por su aspecto más actual.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera N-234, km 481
  • Coordenadas: 42º 15´ 09´´ N, 3º 41´ 11´´ W
  • Tipología: edificio histórico
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión privada

SALDAÑUELA PALACE

Renaissance palace of the XVI century. Although it has undergone several reforms, the exterior area and the cloister maintain original elements.
The interior area presents another type of possibilities for its more modern appearance.

 

  • Address: Road N-234, km 481
  • Coordinates: 42º 15´ 09´´ N, 3º 41´ 11´´ W
  • Typology: historical building
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: private management

Title: Bodega subterránea de Caleruega
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

BODEGA SUBTERRÁNEA DE CALERUEGA

Los orígenes de esta galería subterránea se remontan a finales del Siglo XII. Cuenta con una galería principal de grandes dimensiones, especialmente en altura (4 x 4 metros), comparada con otras bodegas de la zona y unos 25 metros de longitud.

El entorno corresponde a una zona de monte bajo, estando situada la entrada a la bodega en una ladera.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera Bu-922, km 4,5
  • Coordenadas: 41º 48´ 36´´ N, 3º 26´ 57´´ W
  • Tipología: bodega
  • Agua: no
  • Luz: no.
  • Cobertura: en el exterior sí, pero no en el interior.
  • Estado conservación: bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión municipal
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/BodegaCaleruega1.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="BodegaCaleruega1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8902" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8904" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8909" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: Caleruega Underground Cellar
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]CALERUEGA SUBWAY CELLAR The origins of this subway gallery date back to the end of the 12th century. It has a large main gallery, especially in height (4 x 4 meters), compared to other wineries in the area and about 25 meters long. The environment corresponds to an area of scrubland, the entrance to the winery being located on a hillside.
  • Address: BU-922 Road, km 4, Caleruega
  • Coordinates: 41º 48´ 36´´ N, 3º 26´ 57´´ W
  • Typology: celler
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: on the outside, yes, but not on the inside.
  • Condition: good.
  • Ownership: municipallity management

Title: Humedales de Villalba de Duero
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

HUMEDALES DE VILLALBA DE DUERO

El origen de este conjunto de varias lagunas es la integración paisajística, tras una extracción de materiales para graveras, en el entorno de la margen derecha del río Duero en la zona de Vilalba de Duero. Así, observamos viñedos en finchas vecinas.

Comprende un entorno de unas 64 hectáreas, contando la mayor de las lagunas con unas 4 hectáreas de superficie. Se avistan aves con facilidad y se llega sin problema alguno en vehículo.

(Fotografías cedidas por Javier de Pedro Juan)

 

  • Dirección: Villalba de Duero (Camino de El Carrascal)
  • Coordenadas: 41º 40´ 37´´ N, 3º 46´ 02´´ W
  • Tipología: lagunas
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: no.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: Gestión pública
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/LagunasVillalba2.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="LagunasVillalba2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8920" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8916" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

(Fotografías cedidas por Miguel Salazar - Alma Prod.)

Title: Wetlands of Villalba de Duero
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

WETLANDS OF VILLALBA DE DUERO

The origin of this set of several lagoons is the landscape integration, after an extraction of materials for gravel pits, in the environment of the right bank of the Duero River in the area of Vilalba de Duero. Thus, we can see vineyards in neighboring farms.

It covers an area of about 64 hectares, with the largest of the lagoons with a surface area of about 4 hectares. Birds are easily spotted and it is easily reached by car.

  • Coordinates: Villalba de Duero (Road El Carrascal)
  • Coordinates: 41º 40´ 37´´ N, 3º 46´ 02´´ W
  • Typology: lagoon
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: Public management
