Title: Finca Malayerba
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

FINCA MALAYERBA

Malayerba es una agroforestería regenerativa y custodia del territorio, un agropaisaje experimental donde la agricultura disidente y el arte crean un espacio para conectar.

Situado a tres kilómetros del núcleo urbano de Caleruega, en una zona de transición entre un encinar y campos de cereal, supone un agente activo de custodia del paisaje que actúa para atenuar los impactos del cambio climático creando espacios para conectar y catalizar un cambio en el paradigma agrícola actual.

 

  • Dirección: Ctra. Bu-922, km 3, Caleruega
  • Coordenadas: 41º 48´ 60´´ N, 3º 27´ 29´´ W
  • Tipología: campos de cultivo
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: no.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión privada
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Malayerba4.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="Malayerba4" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8936" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8938" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8934" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8930" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: Malayerba farm
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

MALAYERBA FARM

Malayerba is a regenerative agroforestry and land stewardship, an experimental agro-landscape where dissident agriculture and art create a space to connect.

Located three kilometers from the urban center of Caleruega, in a transition zone between a holm oak forest and cereal fields, it is an active agent of landscape stewardship that acts to mitigate the impacts of climate change by creating spaces to connect and catalyze a change in the current agricultural paradigm.

 

  • Address: BU-922 Road, km 3
  • Coordinates: 41º 48´ 60´´ N, 3º 27´ 29´´ W
  • Typology: crop field
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • Condition: very good.
  • Ownership: private - management
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Malayerba4.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="Malayerba4" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8937" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8939" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8935" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="8931" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: Aparcamiento subterráneo del Complejo de la Evolución
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

APARCAMIENTO SUBTERRÁNEO DEL COMPLEJO DE LA EVOLUCIÓN HUMANA

El aparcamiento cuenta con dos plantas subterráneas, dado las grandes dimensiones con las que cuenta (unos 1400 metros cuadrados y 550 plazas), la segunda planta se usa en contadas ocasiones y se encuentra vacía la mayor parte del tiempo.

 

  • Dirección: Paseo Sierra de Atapuerca S/N, Burgos
  • Coordenadas: 42º 20´ 21´´ N, 3º 41´ 53´´ W
  • Tipología: equipamientos
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: media.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno
  • Propiedad: gestión pública

SUBWAY PARKING OF THE HUMAN EVOLUTION COMPLEX

The parking lot has two subway floors, but given its large size (about 1400 square meters and 550 parking spaces), the second floor is rarely used and is empty most of the time.

 

  • Adress: Atapuerca Promenade s/n Burgos
  • Coordinates: 42º 20´ 21´´ N, 3º 41´ 53´´ W
  • Type: facilities
  • Water: yes
  • Electrecity: yes
  • Coverage: medium
  • Condition: very good
  • Ownership: public

REAL CÍRCULO DE LA UNIÓN (CASINO DE BURGOS)

Edificio de 4 plantas con decoración rica en detalles. Perfecto para una ambientación decimonónica. 
Cuenta con varias dependencias, aunque llama especialmente la atención la planta baja en la que se sitúa el comedor. 

 

  • Dirección: Paseo del Espolón 26, Burgos
  • Coordenadas: 42º 20´ 27´´ N, 3º 42´ 06´´ W
  • Tipología: civil
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: Muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión privada

It has several rooms, although the first floor, where the dining room is located, is particularly noteworthy.

.

  • Coordinates:42º 20´ 27´´ N, 3º 42´ 06´´ W
  • Typology: civil
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.

Title: La Yecla
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

DESFILADERO DE LA YECLA

El paso del río Mataviejas por los macizos calcáreos al sur de Santo Domingo de Silos genera un impresionante tajo de unos 300 metros de longitud y unos pocos metros de anchura. En algunos puntos, se pueden tocar las dos paredes de la roca.

No permite el acceso de un equipo voluminoso, aunque hay un aparcamiento en la parte sur que permite desplazar material sin excesiva dificultad.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera BU-910, km 40; Santo Domingo de Silos
  • Coordenadas: 41º 56´ 53´´ N, 3º 26´ 34´´ W
  • Tipología: río
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: no.
  • Cobertura: en la zona más interior, no. En los accesos, sí.
  • Estado conservación: bueno, pero por precaución, es necesario trabajar con casco
  • Propiedad: gestión pública
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/yecla2.jpeg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="yecla2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9542" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9538" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9534" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9540" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: La Yecla
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="row" _builder_version="3.25" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

LA YECLA CANYON

The passage of the Mataviejas River through the limestone massifs to the south of Santo Domingo de Silos generates an impressive gorge some 300 metres long and a few metres wide. At some points, you can touch the two rock walls.

It does not allow access for bulky equipment, although there is a car park on the south side that allows equipment to be moved without undue difficulty.

 

  • Adress: Carretera BU-910, km 40; Santo Domingo de Silos
  • Cordinates: 41º 56´ 53´´ N, 3º 26´ 34´´ W
  • Tipology: river
  • Water: yes
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: in the innermost area, no. At the entrances, yes.
  • State of conservation:good, but as a precaution, it is necessary to work with a helmet.
  • Property: public management

  • Coordenadas: 41º 37´ 45´´ N, 3º 29´ 17´´ W

  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno
  • Propiedad: gestión por parte de la Orden de Agustinos

Title: La Vid Monastery
Content:

LA VID MONASTERY

An Augustinian monastery of more than 7,000 square metres on the banks of the Duero river. It has a guest house and several enclosures of which two cloisters and the large church stand out.

 

  • Adress: Camino Real 3, La Vid
  • Cordinates: 41º 37´ 45´´ N, 3º 29´ 17´´ W
  • Tipology: religious temple
  • Water: yes
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes
  • State of conservation: very good
  • Property: management by the Augustinian Order

GRANJA ESCUELA ARLANZÓN

[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

LA YECLA

The passage of the Mataviejas River through the limestone massifs to the south of Santo Domingo de Silos generates an impressive gorge some 300 metres long and a few metres wide. At some points, you can touch both rock walls.

It does not allow access for bulky equipment, although there is a car park in the southern part that allows you to move material without excessive difficulty.

 

  • Address: Road BU-910, km 40; Santo Domingo de Silos
  • Coordinates: 41º 56´ 53´´ N, 3º 26´ 34´´ W
  • Typology: river
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: in the innermost area, no. At the entrances, yes.
  • Condition: good, but as a precaution, it is necessary to work with a helmet.
  • Ownership: public management

Cuenta con una zona de barra junto a a la entrada, de unos 110 metros y al fondo, un espacio de 120.

  • Tipología: Bar
  • Agua: sí.

Title: Iglesia de Fuenteodra
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

IGLESIA DE FUENTEODRA

La conocida popularmente como Dama de las Loras, estuvo cerca de la ruina absoluta a primeros de este siglo, sin embargo, una encomiable iniciativa de recuperación impulsada por los vecinos, consiguió revertir su estado. El origen del templo se remonta al Siglo XVI, cuenta con una superficie interior libre de unos 200 m2 y una altura de unos 13 metros. La finca exterior suma 468 metros cuadrados.

Actualmente, es visitable, acoge eventos culturales y ya ha recibido rodajes, como el del videoclip de Germán Mey: "Un ángel de verdad".

 

  • Dirección: C/ La Iglesia, Fuenteodra
  • Coordenadas: 42º 40´ 47´´ N, 4º 06´ 31´´ W
  • Tipología: Iglesia
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión privada
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Loras5.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="Loras5" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9954" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9956" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9950" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9952" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: Fuenteodra church
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="row" _builder_version="3.25" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

FUENTEODRA CHURCH

Popularly known as Dama de las Loras, it was close to absolute ruin at the beginning of this century, however, a commendable initiative of recovery promoted by the neighbours, managed to reverse its state. The origin of the temple dates back to the 16th century. It has a free interior surface area of some 200 m2 and a height of some 13 metres. The exterior property totals 468 square metres.

It is currently open to visitors, hosts cultural events and has already hosted filming, such as for the video clip of: Germán Mey: "Un ángel de verdad".

 

  • Adress: C/ La Iglesia, Fuenteodra
  • Cordinates: 42º 40´ 47´´ N, 4º 06´ 31´´ W
  • Tipology: Church
  • Water: yes
  • Electricity: yes
  • Coverage: yes
  • State of conservation: good
  • Property: private management
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Loras5.jpg" alt="habitacion-casa-aviles-osborne" title_text="Loras5" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9954" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9956" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9950" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="9952" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Title: CAREX - Centro Arqueología Experimental
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

CAREX

Instalaciones divulgativas anexas al Yacimiento de Atapuerca, diferenciándose claramente el edificio de recepción de visitantes (más de 4.000 metros cuadrados de superficie), con varias salas diáfanas, y el exterior, con cabañas y recreaciones de espacios prehistóricos, en un entorno de más de una hectárea.

Ha sido una de las localizaciones de rodaje de la película La Huella del mal, de Manuel Ríos.

 

  • Dirección: Camino de Fresno de Rodilla s/n Atapuerca
  • Coordenadas: 42º 22´ 45´´ N, 3º 29´ 55´´ W
  • Tipología: Edificio institucional
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión publica

Title: La Yecla
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

LA YECLA

The passage of the Mataviejas River through the limestone massifs to the south of Santo Domingo de Silos generates an impressive gorge some 300 metres long and a few metres wide. At some points, you can touch both rock walls.

It does not allow access for bulky equipment, although there is a car park in the southern part that allows you to move material without excessive difficulty.

 

  • Address: Road BU-910, km 40; Santo Domingo de Silos
  • Coordinates: 41º 56´ 53´´ N, 3º 26´ 34´´ W
  • Typology: river
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: in the innermost area, no. At the entrances, yes.
  • Condition: good, but as a precaution, it is necessary to work with a helmet.
  • Ownership: public management

MOLINO DE MONTORIO

Antiguo molino sobre el rio Úrbel. Cuenta con un edificio principal de unos 150 metros cuadrados y unas instalaciones anexas. 

La finca se extiende alrededor del molino, con paseos bucólicos y frondosos.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera CL-622, km 26
  • Coordenadas: 42º 33´ 50´´ N, 3º 46´ 31´´ W
  • Tipología: molino
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: muy bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión privada

MONTORIO MILL

Old mill on the river Úrbel. It has a main building of about 150 square metres and annexed facilities..

The estate extends around the mill, with bucolic and leafy walks.

 

  • Adress: Carretera CL-622, km 26
  • Cordinates: 42º 33´ 50´´ N, 3º 46´ 31´´ W
  • Tipology: mill
  • Water: yes
  • Electricity: yes
  • Coverage: yes
  • State of conservation: very good
  • Property: private management

Title: San Antonio Hermitage
Content:

SAN ANTONIO HERMITAGE

Private hermitage of small dimensions (about 200 square metres of floor space), but of great charm.

 

  • Adress: C/ Rodríguez Valcárcel, Pradoluengo
  • Cordinates: 42º 19´ 00´´ N, 3º 11´ 03´´ W
  • Tipología: hermitage
  • Water: yes
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes.
  • State of conservation: very good.
  • Propertiy: private management

Title: Botería de Covarrubias
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

MOLINO DE MONTORIO

Instalación industrial para encurtir pieles y fabricar botas de vino. Presenta una serie de maquinas extrañas con aspecto decadente, pero en perfecto funcionamiento. La finca se sitúa junto al Río Arlanza..

 

  • Dirección: C/ Tenerías Bajas 29, Covarrubias
  • Coordenadas: 42º 03´ 25´´ N, 3º 31´ 25´´ W
  • Tipología: industria
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: bueno.
  • Propiedad: gestión privada

Title: Covarrubias wine boot workshop
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="row" _builder_version="3.25" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

COVARRUBIAS WINE BOOT WORKSHOP 

Industrial facility for pickling hides and making wineskins. It has a series of strange machines with a decadent appearance, but in perfect working order. The estate is situated next to the Arlanza River.

 

  • Adress: C/ Tenerías Bajas 29, Covarrubias
  • Cordinates: 42º 03´ 25´´ N, 3º 31´ 25´´ W
  • Tipology: factory
  • Water: yes
  • Electricity: yes.
  • Coverage: yes
  • State of conservation: good
  • Property: private management

Title: Castil de Carrias
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.47" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://burgosfilmcommission.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/D7R6887_reduced.jpg" mix_blend_mode="difference" link_option_url="bnbvnbvncvv" border_color_all="#e02b20" border_style_all="none" global_module="246" saved_tabs="all" collapsed="off"][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||"]

CASTIL DE CARRIAS

Pueblo abandonado, pero con posibilidades para rodaje. De hecho, ha acogido en el pasado secuencias de la serie "Gernika bajo las bombas (2012)" y recientemente, "Sacamantecas" (David Pérez Sañudo). Cuenta con unas 25 casas.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera BU-711
  • Coordenadas: 42º 28´ 05´´ N, 3º 16´ 11´´ W
  • Tipología: pueblo abandonado
  • Agua: no.
  • Luz: no.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: medio.
  • Propiedad: gestión pública

CASTIL DE CARRIAS

Abandoned village, but with potential for filming. In fact, it has hosted in the past sequences of the series ‘Gernika bajo las bombas (2012)’ and recently, ‘Sacamantecas’ (David Pérez Sañudo). It has about 25 houses.

 

  • Adress: Carretera BU-711
  • Cordinates: 42º 28´ 05´´ N, 3º 16´ 11´´ W
  • Tipology: pueblo abandonado
  • Water: no.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: sí.
  • State of conservatio: medio.
  • Property: public management

Title: La Yecla
Content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="991.9px" custom_margin="-2px|||||"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" min_height="380.9px" custom_padding="48px|||||"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="20px" custom_padding="1px|||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

LA YECLA

The passage of the Mataviejas River through the limestone massifs to the south of Santo Domingo de Silos generates an impressive gorge some 300 metres long and a few metres wide. At some points, you can touch both rock walls.

It does not allow access for bulky equipment, although there is a car park in the southern part that allows you to move material without excessive difficulty.

 

  • Address: Road BU-910, km 40; Santo Domingo de Silos
  • Coordinates: 41º 56´ 53´´ N, 3º 26´ 34´´ W
  • Typology: river
  • Water: yes.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: in the innermost area, no. At the entrances, yes.
  • Condition: good, but as a precaution, it is necessary to work with a helmet.
  • Ownership: public management

Title: Plaza San Antón - Patio interior
Content:

PLAZA DE SAN ANTÓN - PATIO INTERIOR

Patio urbano de unos 700 metros cuadrados con aspecto un poco decadente. La arquitectura de los edificios que lo rodea permite ambientar una secuencia urbana en cualquier ciudad europea.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera BU-711
  • Coordenadas: 42º 21´ 18´´ N, 3º 40´ 05´´ W
  • Tipología: calles y plazas
  • Agua: sí.
  • Luz: sí.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: medio.
  • Propiedad: gestión privada

SAN ANTÓN SQUARE - INNER COURTYARD

Urban courtyard of about 700 square metres with a slightly decadent appearance. The architecture of the surrounding buildings allows to set an urban sequence in any European city.

 

  • Adress: Carretera BU-711
  • Cordinates: 42º 21´ 18´´ N, 3º 40´ 05´´ W
  • Tipology: calles y plazas
  • Water: yes
  • Electricity: yes
  • Coverage: yes
  • State of conservation: medio.
  • Propertiy: private management

CASTIL DE CARRIAS

Abandoned village, but with potential for filming. In fact, it has hosted in the past sequences of the series ‘Gernika bajo las bombas (2012)’ and recently, ‘Sacamantecas’ (David Pérez Sañudo). It has about 25 houses.

 

  • Adress: Carretera BU-711
  • Cordinates: 42º 28´ 05´´ N, 3º 16´ 11´´ W
  • Tipology: pueblo abandonado
  • Water: no.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: sí.
  • State of conservatio: medio.
  • Property: public management

CASTIL DE CARRIAS

Pueblo abandonado, pero con posibilidades para rodaje. De hecho, ha acogido en el pasado secuencias de la serie "Gernika bajo las bombas (2012)" y recientemente, "Sacamantecas" (David Pérez Sañudo). Cuenta con unas 25 casas.

 

  • Dirección: Carretera BU-711
  • Coordenadas: 42º 28´ 05´´ N, 3º 16´ 11´´ W
  • Tipología: pueblo abandonado
  • Agua: no.
  • Luz: no.
  • Cobertura: sí.
  • Estado conservación: medio.
  • Propiedad: gestión pública

CASTIL DE CARRIAS

Abandoned village, but with potential for filming. In fact, it has hosted in the past sequences of the series ‘Gernika bajo las bombas (2012)’ and recently, ‘Sacamantecas’ (David Pérez Sañudo). It has about 25 houses.

 

  • Adress: Carretera BU-711
  • Cordinates: 42º 28´ 05´´ N, 3º 16´ 11´´ W
  • Tipology: pueblo abandonado
  • Water: no.
  • Electricity: no.
  • Coverage: sí.
  • State of conservatio: medio.
  • Property: public management
